title: Quantum Vacuum Virtual Plasma
alt: I don't understand the things you do, and you therefore may represent an interaction with the quantum vacuum virtual plasma.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are walking together in the foreground.]
Cueball: Hear about that "impossible" microwave thruster?[They stop walking and Cueball turns to face Megan.]
Megan: Yeah. Let me get this straight â€” they pumped 20 kilowatts into a box under ambient conditions
...and it only twitched a little?
Cueball: Yeah.[Zoomed out - they are seen in silhouette walking together again.]
Megan: That's surprising. If you pumped 20 kilowatts into me, I'd twitch a lot.
Cueball: But you're not pushing on the quantum vacuum.
Megan: I might be. I do a lot of things.
Cueball: I guess we can't be sure.
